publication.title: Detection of Genes in Arabidopsis thaliana L. Responding to DNA Damage from Radiation and Other Stressors in Spaceflight

assays: Pearson correlation-based gene regulatory network inferencing
topological and spectral analysis of the networks

results.effect: Protein-protein interaction similarities under low radiation doses
Identification of key genes involved in DNA repair
Activation of flavonoids and carotenoids under specific radiation doses
